lines: 1. Pa mapazi ake Yesu, Ndimva mau akewo!
Ee, pafupi ndi Ambuye, N’khale nthawi zonsezo;
Pa mapazi ake Yesu, Ndiyang’ana m’mbuyomo,
Ee, chikondi chake chonse, Chakopadi mtimanga.
2. Pa mapazi ake Yesu, Malo opambanawo;
Ndisiyepo tchimo langa, Ndi kupeza mpumulo;
Pa mapazi ake Yesu, Ndimalira mtimanga,
Pomwe ndimapeza nsisi, Tsiku lili lonselo.
Ndikhaletu nawo mtima, Monga Yesu Mbuyeyo,
